caption.title: Bayesian inferences of random local clocks on influenza NA genes.
caption.p: A: H5N1 (1A.1), B: North American swine N1 (1B), C: Human H1N1 (1C), D: H9N2 (2A.1), E: Equine N7 (7C), F: Yama88 influenza B NA (Yama88). Branch coloring indicates inferred rates of nucleotide substitution from blue (slow) to red (fast). The scale bar indicates the number of years before the present.
